text.p: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd said Wednesday it has extended to July 1 its $5.40 per share cash tender offer to acquire all outstanding shares of AST Research Inc.
Samsung said about 27.4 million shares, or roughly 87 percent of the outstanding shares not owned by Samsung, had been tendered as of June 17.
The company said the offer is being extended to allow additional time for required approvals by the government of the Republic of Korea. All other government approvals have been obtained.
The tender offer and withdrawal rights will now expire at 1700 EDT Tuesday, July 1, it said.
